last_episode_to_air.name: Facing the Truth
last_episode_to_air.overview: Trason throws a big Obama party. Seiko is thinking of moving to Vegas but a confession has her hesitating over her decision.

name: Baldwin Hills
overview: Baldwin Hills is an American reality television series featuring African-American teenagers from the Baldwin Hills district in Los Angeles, California. The series aired on BET from July 2007 to March 2009.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The first season of Baldwin Hills premiered on July 10, 2007 and concluded on August 28, 2007.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The second season of Baldwin Hills premiered on June 24, 2008 and concluded on August 19, 2008.

episodes.name: Life! No Limits
episodes.overview: Jordan, fronting his own company that organizes parties for kids, aspires to throw a hip Hollywood club party---to his mother's chagrin. Elsewhere, Staci is apprehensive about attending Jordan's shindig because the rich kids will be there.

episodes.name: Party Aftermath
episodes.overview: Jordan raises the ire of a club owner when he keeps all of his club party's profits. In other developments, a jittery Earl asks dancer Ashley for a date; and budding rapper Sal tries to enlist Willie to shoot photographs for his album.

episodes.name: We Wanna Know
episodes.overview: As class president Gaven goes on a first date with streetwise Staci, the driven Roqui quarrels with her father over the purchase of her dream car. Elsewhere, a love triangle develops.

episodes.name: Beach Party Fiasco
episodes.overview: Garnette's friends try to make amends when her birthday party goes awry. Meanwhile, Earl has trouble at home and hopes to stay with Daymeon.

episodes.name: Date Night Drama
episodes.overview: The love triangle between Moriah, Gerren and Daymeon is getting really complicated...for Gerren that is.

episodes.name: Don't Call Me
episodes.overview: Earl has two tough breaks when he bombs at a stand-up show and flubs a date with Ashley. Meanwhile, Sal and Willie keep their flirtation going.

episodes.name: Setting Things Straight
episodes.overview: A dance recital keeps Ashley busy; Moriah tests his parents by sneaking out to see Gerren; Garnette and Jordan confront one another.

episodes.name: Prom Night Tears
episodes.overview: Moriah supports Gerren as she commemorates her friend's death. Elsewhere, Staci bonds with her mother and the gang prepares for prom.

episodes.name: Steppin' It Up
episodes.overview: The kids face big decisions as Sal asks Willie how she feels about him, Gerren considers dumping Moriah, and Staci weighs the pros and cons of college.

episodes.name: Road to Success
episodes.overview: Ashley throws a graduation party; Sal takes the next step with his album; Gerren and Moriah evaluate their relationship; and Staci continues to contemplate college.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: The first season of Baldwin Hills premiered on July 10, 2007 and concluded on August 28, 2007.

episodes.name: The Pop Off
episodes.overview: The new cast of BALDWIN HILLS grapples with the challenges of adulthood.

episodes.name: Test of Will
episodes.overview: The BALDWIN HILLS teens tackle issues on respect, overcoming their checkered past and celebrating accomplishments.

episodes.name: Going At It!
episodes.overview: The BALDWIN HILLS teens are going at it from double dating to worrying over the past.

episodes.name: Big Shots
episodes.overview: From big dreams to big losses the Baldwin Hills teens get a taste of the fabulous life and everything that comes with it.

episodes.name: Fashion Flair
episodes.overview: Promises are hard to keep when emotions are rising after trouble is instigated during a hip downtown loft party.

episodes.name: It's Like That
episodes.overview: Secrets are exchanged and dates are planned, but as their plans unravel the teens begin to recognize the need for a Plan B.

episodes.name: Decisions, Decisions
episodes.overview: The Baldwin Hills teens enjoy prom night, leaving their parents to ponder, 'what's next?'

episodes.name: Famous Aunties
episodes.overview: Growing relationships, big secrets revealed, and advice famous "Aunties" overwhelm the Baldwin Hills teens.

episodes.name: The Glamourous LIfe
episodes.overview: The Baldwin Hills teens are distracted with major career issues including a movie premiere, record label, and a pregnancy.

episodes.name: Separate Ways
episodes.overview: Graduation has arrived and it is time to party before the Baldwin Hills teens go their separate ways

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The second season of Baldwin Hills premiered on June 24, 2008 and concluded on August 19, 2008.

episodes.name: Turning Points
episodes.overview: Catch Season 3 of Baldwin Hills, where many cast members find themselves at significant turning points in their lives.

episodes.name: Let's Talk
episodes.overview: The Baldwin Hills teens have pressing issues and need to talk! They seek out one another to talk through their individual and couple challenges.

episodes.name: Put Your Game On
episodes.overview: A double date gone wrong and sorrowful news upset the Baldwin Hills teens.

episodes.name: Oh, That's Awkward!
episodes.overview: A double date gone wrong and sorrowful news upset the Baldwin Hills teens.

episodes.name: Keeping Their Cool!
episodes.overview: The Baldwin Hills teens are about their business and keeping their cool amidst relationship drama, and setting matters straight.

episodes.name: Tough Questions
episodes.overview: The Baldwin Hills teens face tough questions as they take serious steps towards the future.

episodes.name: The Grill
episodes.overview: Aysia's Aunt Tia grills Justin before he takes Aysia on their one on one date.

episodes.name: Vegas Dreaming
episodes.overview: Seiko and Justin reveal that they are each planning a trip to Vegas. The teens take part in the Divas Simply Singing charity event.

episodes.name: Just Friends?
episodes.overview: The gang all head to Vegas to celebrate Justin's birthday. Meanwhile, homecoming is skipped for a special date instead.

episodes.name: Facing the Truth
episodes.overview: Trason throws a big Obama party. Seiko is thinking of moving to Vegas but a confession has her hesitating over her decision.
